notes.text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 33 for SLE 12 SP2)
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.121-92_125 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2020-10757: Fixed an issue where remaping hugepage DAX to anon mmap could have caused user PTE access (bsc#1172437).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in the Linux Kernel in versions after 4.5-rc1 in the way mremap handled DAX Huge Pages. This flaw allows a local attacker with access to a DAX enabled storage to escalate their privileges on the system.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
